questionnaire.title: Portrait Values Questionnaire-Revised (PVQ-RR)
questionnaire.description: Here we briefly describe different people. Please read each description and think about how much that person is or is not like you. Rate each item using the 6-point scale.
questionnaire.instructions: Rate how much each person described is like you using the scale from 1 (Not like me at all) to 6 (Very much like me).

pvq_rr_en_q001.male: It is important to him to form his views independently.
pvq_rr_en_q001.female: It is important to her to form her views independently.

pvq_rr_en_q002.male: It is important to him that his country is secure and stable.
pvq_rr_en_q002.female: It is important to her that her country is secure and stable.

pvq_rr_en_q003.male: It is important to him to have a good time.
pvq_rr_en_q003.female: It is important to her to have a good time.

pvq_rr_en_q004.male: It is important to him to avoid upsetting other people.
pvq_rr_en_q004.female: It is important to her to avoid upsetting other people.

pvq_rr_en_q005.male: It is important to him that the weak and vulnerable in society be protected.
pvq_rr_en_q005.female: It is important to her that the weak and vulnerable in society be protected.

pvq_rr_en_q006.male: It is important to him that people do what he says they should.
pvq_rr_en_q006.female: It is important to her that people do what she says they should.

pvq_rr_en_q007.male: It is important to him never to think he deserves more than other people.
pvq_rr_en_q007.female: It is important to her never to think she deserves more than other people.

pvq_rr_en_q008.male: It is important to him to care for nature.
pvq_rr_en_q008.female: It is important to her to care for nature.

pvq_rr_en_q009.male: It is important to him that no one should ever shame him.
pvq_rr_en_q009.female: It is important to her that no one should ever shame her.

pvq_rr_en_q010.male: It is important to him always to look for different things to do.
pvq_rr_en_q010.female: It is important to her always to look for different things to do.

pvq_rr_en_q011.male: It is important to him to take care of people he is close to.
pvq_rr_en_q011.female: It is important to her to take care of people she is close to.

pvq_rr_en_q012.male: It is important to him to have the power that money can bring.
pvq_rr_en_q012.female: It is important to her to have the power that money can bring.

pvq_rr_en_q013.male: It is very important to him to avoid disease and protect his health.
pvq_rr_en_q013.female: It is very important to her to avoid disease and protect her health.

pvq_rr_en_q014.male: It is important to him to be tolerant toward all kinds of people and groups.
pvq_rr_en_q014.female: It is important to her to be tolerant toward all kinds of people and groups.

pvq_rr_en_q015.male: It is important to him never to violate rules or regulations.
pvq_rr_en_q015.female: It is important to her never to violate rules or regulations.

pvq_rr_en_q016.male: It is important to him to make his own decisions about his life.
pvq_rr_en_q016.female: It is important to her to make her own decisions about her life.

pvq_rr_en_q017.male: It is important to him to have ambitions in life.
pvq_rr_en_q017.female: It is important to her to have ambitions in life.

pvq_rr_en_q018.male: It is important to him to maintain traditional values and ways of thinking.
pvq_rr_en_q018.female: It is important to her to maintain traditional values and ways of thinking.

pvq_rr_en_q019.male: It is important to him that people he knows have full confidence in him.
pvq_rr_en_q019.female: It is important to her that people she knows have full confidence in her.

pvq_rr_en_q020.male: It is important to him to be wealthy.
pvq_rr_en_q020.female: It is important to her to be wealthy.

pvq_rr_en_q021.male: It is important to him to take part in activities to defend nature.
pvq_rr_en_q021.female: It is important to her to take part in activities to defend nature.

pvq_rr_en_q022.male: It is important to him never to annoy anyone.
pvq_rr_en_q022.female: It is important to her never to annoy anyone.

pvq_rr_en_q023.male: It is important to him to develop his own opinions.
pvq_rr_en_q023.female: It is important to her to develop her own opinions.

pvq_rr_en_q024.male: It is important to him to protect his public image.
pvq_rr_en_q024.female: It is important to her to protect her public image.

pvq_rr_en_q025.male: It is very important to him to help the people dear to him.
pvq_rr_en_q025.female: It is very important to her to help the people dear to her.

pvq_rr_en_q026.male: It is important to him to be personally safe and secure.
pvq_rr_en_q026.female: It is important to her to be personally safe and secure.

pvq_rr_en_q027.male: It is important to him to be a dependable and trustworthy friend.
pvq_rr_en_q027.female: It is important to her to be a dependable and trustworthy friend.

pvq_rr_en_q028.male: It is important to him to take risks that make life exciting.
pvq_rr_en_q028.female: It is important to her to take risks that make life exciting.

pvq_rr_en_q029.male: It is important to him to have the power to make people do what he wants.
pvq_rr_en_q029.female: It is important to her to have the power to make people do what she wants.

pvq_rr_en_q030.male: It is important to him to plan his activities independently.
pvq_rr_en_q030.female: It is important to her to plan her activities independently.

pvq_rr_en_q031.male: It is important to him to follow rules even when no-one is watching.
pvq_rr_en_q031.female: It is important to her to follow rules even when no-one is watching.

pvq_rr_en_q032.male: It is important to him to be very successful.
pvq_rr_en_q032.female: It is important to her to be very successful.

pvq_rr_en_q033.male: It is important to him to follow his family's customs or the customs of a religion.
pvq_rr_en_q033.female: It is important to her to follow her family's customs or the customs of a religion.

pvq_rr_en_q034.male: It is important to him to listen to and understand people who are different from him.
pvq_rr_en_q034.female: It is important to her to listen to and understand people who are different from her.

pvq_rr_en_q035.male: It is important to him to have a strong state that can defend its citizens.
pvq_rr_en_q035.female: It is important to her to have a strong state that can defend its citizens.

pvq_rr_en_q036.male: It is important to him to enjoy life's pleasures.
pvq_rr_en_q036.female: It is important to her to enjoy life's pleasures.

pvq_rr_en_q037.male: It is important to him that every person in the world have equal opportunities in life.
pvq_rr_en_q037.female: It is important to her that every person in the world have equal opportunities in life.

pvq_rr_en_q038.male: It is important to him to be humble.
pvq_rr_en_q038.female: It is important to her to be humble.

pvq_rr_en_q039.male: It is important to him to figure things out himself.
pvq_rr_en_q039.female: It is important to her to figure things out herself.

pvq_rr_en_q040.male: It is important to him to honor the traditional practices of his culture.
pvq_rr_en_q040.female: It is important to her to honor the traditional practices of her culture.

pvq_rr_en_q041.male: It is important to him to be the one who tells others what to do.
pvq_rr_en_q041.female: It is important to her to be the one who tells others what to do.

pvq_rr_en_q042.male: It is important to him to obey all the laws.
pvq_rr_en_q042.female: It is important to her to obey all the laws.

pvq_rr_en_q043.male: It is important to him to have all sorts of new experiences.
pvq_rr_en_q043.female: It is important to her to have all sorts of new experiences.

pvq_rr_en_q044.male: It is important to him to own expensive things that show his wealth
pvq_rr_en_q044.female: It is important to her to own expensive things that show her wealth

pvq_rr_en_q045.male: It is important to him to protect the natural environment from destruction or polution.
pvq_rr_en_q045.female: It is important to her to protect the natural environment from destruction or pollution.

pvq_rr_en_q046.male: It is important to him to take advantage of every opportunity to have fun.
pvq_rr_en_q046.female: It is important to her to take advantage of every opportunity to have fun.

pvq_rr_en_q047.male: It is important to him to concern himself with every need of his dear ones.
pvq_rr_en_q047.female: It is important to her to concern herself with every need of her dear ones.

pvq_rr_en_q048.male: It is important to him that people recognize what he achieves.
pvq_rr_en_q048.female: It is important to her that people recognize what she achieves.

pvq_rr_en_q049.male: It is important to him never to be humiliated.
pvq_rr_en_q049.female: It is important to her never to be humiliated.

pvq_rr_en_q050.male: It is important to him that his country protect itself against all threats.
pvq_rr_en_q050.female: It is important to her that her country protect itself against all threats.

pvq_rr_en_q051.male: It is important to him never to make other people angry.
pvq_rr_en_q051.female: It is important to her never to make other people angry.

pvq_rr_en_q052.male: It is important to him that everyone be treated justly, even people he doesn't know.
pvq_rr_en_q052.female: It is important to her that everyone be treated justly, even people she doesn't know.

pvq_rr_en_q053.male: It is important to him to avoid anything dangerous.
pvq_rr_en_q053.female: It is important to her to avoid anything dangerous.

pvq_rr_en_q054.male: It is important to him to be satisfied with what he has and not ask for more.
pvq_rr_en_q054.female: It is important to her to be satisfied with what she has and not ask for more.

pvq_rr_en_q055.male: It is important to him that all his friends and family can rely on him completely.
pvq_rr_en_q055.female: It is important to her that all her friends and family can rely on her completely.

pvq_rr_en_q056.male: It is important to him to be free to choose what he does by himself.
pvq_rr_en_q056.female: It is important to her to be free to choose what she does by herself.

pvq_rr_en_q057.male: It is important to him to accept people even when he disagrees with them.
pvq_rr_en_q057.female: It is important to her to accept people even when she disagrees with them.
